page.title: 19GHOSTS AND LEGENDS
page.content: There are many stories of ghosts around Flamstead.Dick Turpin who frequented the area is supposed to be seen,so is the "Grey Lady" who in her own way was a highwaywoman as well as the Lady of the Manor living at the cell in Markyate.There are supposed to be many tunnels connecting the old historic buildings of the area but these are yet to be found.Most of the legends in fact surround highwayman as the Watling Street(now the A5) has been a major route for many hundreds of years and was a rich hunting ground for these villains.
